statements: SELECT * FROM job_postings
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time'
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_postings ORDER BY date_posted DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_jobs FROM job_postings WHERE job_location = 'New York'
SELECT id, job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_location = 'San Francisco'
SELECT * FROM job_postings WHERE job_location='New York' ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_type, date_posted FROM job_postings WHERE job_type='Full-Time' ORDER BY date_posted ASC;
SELECT job_title, job_description, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_location='San Francisco' AND job_type='Remote';
SELECT id, job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_location='Chicago' AND job_type='Part-Time' ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM job_postings WHERE job_type='Contract' AND job_location='Los Angeles' ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM applicants WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT job_id, job_title, job_location FROM job_postings ORDER BY job_location DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, job_title FROM applicants INNER JOIN job_postings ON applicants.job_id = job_postings.job_id
SELECT * FROM job_postings
SELECT job_title, job_location, posting_date FROM job_postings WHERE posting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT job_id, job_title, job_description FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-Time'
SELECT * FROM applicants JOIN job_postings ON applicants.job_id = job_postings.job_id WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, job_title FROM applicants JOIN job_postings ON applicants.job_id = job_postings.job_id WHERE posting_date < '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM applicants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM applicants ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) as total_applications FROM job_postings p JOIN applications a ON p.id = a.job_posting_id GROUP BY job_title ORDER BY total_applications DESC;
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM applicants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT job_title FROM job_postings ORDER BY job_location DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_postings WHERE job_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM applicant_information;
SELECT interview_date, interview_time, interview_location FROM interview_schedule WHERE interview_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT job_title, applicant_name, status FROM job_postings JOIN application_status ON job_postings.job_id = application_status.job_id JOIN applicant_information ON application_status.applicant_id = applicant_information.applicant_id;
SELECT job_title, job_description, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT * FROM applicant_information WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings ORDER BY job_location ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, applicant_phone FROM applicant_information WHERE applicant_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT job_title, job_type FROM job_postings WHERE job_location = 'New York' ORDER BY job_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM job_postings;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type = 'Full-time';
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_postings ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, applicant_phone FROM applicants WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT a.applicant_name, s.skill_name FROM applicants a JOIN applicant_skills ap ON a.applicant_id = ap.applicant_id JOIN skills s ON ap.skill_id = s.skill_id;
SELECT * FROM job_postings
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_postings WHERE job_type='Full-time'
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM applicants WHERE LENGTH(applicant_phone) > 0
SELECT job_title, application_date, status FROM job_postings JOIN applications ON job_postings.job_id = applications.job_id
SELECT job_title, COUNT(*) AS applicants_count FROM job_postings JOIN applications ON job_postings.job_id = applications.job_id GROUP BY job_title HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
